item.title: Soccer World Cup 2016 - Betting At My Workplace - Part I+II
Body Height and BMI in European Soccer Players over the years 2008-2016
item.description: How did Body Mass Index and body size of professional football players change over the years 2008-2016? Body size, not so much. It has stayed rather constant. Average height, body weight and Body Mass Index have fallen.

item.title: The oldest European Soccer Players in the late 2000s
item.description: While doing some quality-checks in Kaggle Dataset ‚ÄúEuropean Soccer Database‚Äù, I found that in the late 2000s most of the oldest professional players active in top clubs were goalkeepers. Another veteran midfielder was Tugay Kerimoƒülu, from Turkey. Born in 1970, he played the English Premier League until‚Ä¶ when, exactly?

item.title: European Soccer Players and their BMI
item.description: Players in European soccer leagues have a Body Mass Index (BMI) that is normally distributed with a mean of 23 and an sd of 1.3. This is independent of body size.
